content.rendered:
A leader in respectful
relationships on and
off the road

Whether you’re a customer or a trucker,
your needs matter to us.

Top tier technology
and timely deliveries

Over the road capacity is no problem for us,
as our fleet is equipped with state-of-the-art
transponders, Elogs, and GPS systems.

A wealth of opportunities
for drivers in North
America

Lucrative salaries, bonuses, awards,
and enticing holiday pay, our drivers
have sustainable career growth.

Round the clock
support

Our 24/7 logistics specialists are on standby
to stop your truck from getting stuck
and seek out reloads for you.

Trucks

Trailers

Drivers

Customers

About us

Founded by a former trucker, Linestar Logistics is a freight company that places its drivers at the forefront of its operations. We’re a company that’s constantly evolving its ways to make drivers feel like valued family members. Our team is vast, experienced, and are fully supported on and off the road in North America.

We provide truckers with a state of the art fleet using vehicles such as the latest Freightliner, Volvos, Kenworth, or International vehicles before their commercial release. Plus, we have a track record for ensuring timely deliveries and surpassing our customer expectations.

Most importantly, we devote ourselves to building respectful relationships for our drivers and logistics team members. We believe we only can succeed if we operate according to their needs.

Read more

Why choose us

Read more

Dedicated drivers towards

Non stop support and safety

Constant communication

Innovative methods

Competent at handling complexities

Our services

Dry Van

Send or receive goods straight from the warehouse over a long distance with our state of the art trailers.

Partial Loads

Reserve a specific area of our vehicles to send a small number of goods at an economical price across the country.

Drop and Hook

Our drivers can take your goods straight to the shipper or pick them up directly from the port.

Learn more

Work for us

Our drivers are treated like our own family members. They earn a salary of $3200 upwards, most of which are earning between $3700-$9300 a week.

Learn more here

$3700-$9300 a week.

GET IN TOUCH

At Linestar, we pride ourselves on our 24/7 accessibility.

Apply as a driver
Contact us
